name: part_001
file: tmp_【3D SHOWCASE】HOPE IS ON THE MOVE! #3DRyS [dR9q_J-8mfM]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_001.mov

scenes.description: Performance of the song 'Caesura of Despair'.
MC section where IRyS greets the audience and talks about her 3D model and the stage setting.

subtitles.original: 運命に駆け寄っていこう
subtitles.english: Let's run toward destiny

subtitles.original: 黒い指に沈む君の手に
subtitles.english: Into your hand sinking into black fingers

subtitles.original: 届け
subtitles.english: Reach out

subtitles.original: 願ってるよ 未来の足音
subtitles.english: I'm wishing, the footsteps of the future

subtitles.original: 手と手をつなごう オーケストラ
subtitles.english: Let's join hands, orchestra

subtitles.original: 懐かしくも淡い歌で
subtitles.english: With a nostalgic and faint song

subtitles.original: 奏でて
subtitles.english: Playing

subtitles.original: 奏でて
subtitles.english: Playing

subtitles.original: 夜明けが聞こえる
subtitles.english: The dawn can be heard

subtitles.original: Believe in destiny 約束を果たすから
subtitles.english: Believe in destiny, because I'll fulfill my promise

subtitles.original: いつか理由に 語りきれないほど響いて
subtitles.english: One day, let it resonate so much that it can't be told as a reason

subtitles.original: 嘆きも後悔も 笑い飛ばそうよ
subtitles.english: Let's laugh off the grief and regrets

subtitles.original: そんな形に 希望と名付けよう
subtitles.english: Let's name such forms "hope"

subtitles.original: きっと
subtitles.english: Surely

subtitles.original: Despair 晴れるように歌うから
subtitles.english: I'll sing so that despair clears up

subtitles.original: そして Make a wish 鮮やかに飾るから
subtitles.english: And make a wish, because I'll decorate it vividly

subtitles.original: 君だけの声と 重ねるように
subtitles.english: So that it overlaps with only your voice

subtitles.original: こんな世界だって 側にいるよ
subtitles.english: Even in a world like this, I'll be by your side

subtitles.original: Darkness fade away
subtitles.english: Darkness fade away

subtitles.original: Iris will light your way
subtitles.english: Iris will light your way

subtitles.original: Our journey has only just begun right now
subtitles.english: Our journey has only just begun right now

subtitles.original: HiRyS! It's IRyS!
subtitles.english: HiRyS! It's IRyS!

subtitles.original: in 3D from Hololive English! Woo!
subtitles.english: in 3D from Hololive English! Woo!

subtitles.original: Thank you so much guys for coming to my 3D showcase!
subtitles.english: Thank you so much guys for coming to my 3D showcase!

subtitles.english: Thank you so much for coming to my 3D showcase!

subtitles.original: I fell from a very, very high height, but I got wings so I'm fine.
subtitles.english: I fell from a very, very high height, but I got wings so I'm fine.

subtitles.original: 落ちたけど全然大丈夫だよ！
subtitles.english: I fell but I'm totally fine!

subtitles.original: この素敵なステージ見てください。
subtitles.english: Please check out this wonderful stage.

subtitles.english: Thank you! Please check out my beautiful stage in the middle of a big city,

subtitles.original: and that beautiful red tower behind, yes!
subtitles.english: and that beautiful red tower behind, yes!

subtitles.english: With that beautiful red tower, it's very urban.

subtitles.original: IRyS、都会っ子です。
subtitles.english: IRyS is a city girl.

subtitles.original: I am a city girl. Very much a city girl.
subtitles.english: I am a city girl. Very much a city girl.

subtitles.original: I'm going to be singing a lot of songs on this stage. I'm so excited!
subtitles.english: I'm going to be singing a lot of songs on this stage. I'm so excited!

subtitles.original: Alrighty, so this is just the start,
subtitles.english: Alrighty, so this is just the start,

subtitles.original: but if you have any thoughts about my 3D showcase,
subtitles.english: but if you have any thoughts about my 3D showcase,

subtitles.english: or if you want to tweet about it, please use the hashtag #3DRyS right here.

subtitles.original: Yes, please use the hashtag to tweet. Let's go!
subtitles.english: Yes, please use the hashtag to tweet. Let's go!

subtitles.original: There's going to be a lot of fun stuff.
subtitles.english: There's going to be a lot of fun stuff.

subtitles.english: Alrighty then. I can move so much now!

subtitles.english: Like I said in my hype, beautiful IRyS movement!

subtitles.english: Anyways, I'm going to be singing a lot more.
